title.appflowy: A <0>privacy-first</0> open source workspace for your notes, wikis, and projects
title.centralized-place: A <0>centralized</0> place for your tasks, notes, and projects. <1>Organize and visualize your data in table, board, calendar, and more.</1>

description.appflowy: <0>AppFlowy</0> is the smart workspace where you have the full control and get more done, better and faster.
description.an-extensible-and-customizable: <0>An extensible and customizable</0> knowledge base built on a community-driven open toolbox of plugins, templates, themes, and more.
description.table: <0>Table.</0> You can build detailed lists projects while tracking the status of each one
description.board: <0>Kanban Board</0> are the best way to manage projects and tasks.
description.calendar: <0>Calendar.</0> You have a bird’s-eye view of important launch dates

switch-dark-light.name: Switch between dark and light themes

go-way-beyond.name: Go way beyond text & bullet points

discover-ai.title: <0>Discover <1>AI's </1></0>full power in a stunning rich-text editor

without-switching.title: <0>Without </0>switching
without-switching.description: Right inside appflowy, you can enjoy the full power of AI without tool switching.

data-control.title: <0>Data </0>control
data-control.description: Your data is not sent to any AI service providers such as OpenAI, unless you choose to send.

choose-ai-service.title: <0>Choose </0>AI service
choose-ai-service.description: OpenAI, Stability AI and Langchain. you can choose the service you like.

data-security.title: Built for who care about <0>data security</0>

data-control.title: Data control
data-control.description: You can host AppFlowy wherever you want; no vendor lock-in.

always-available.title: Always available
always-available.description: AppFlow works completely offline, internet or service issues will never be your problem.

forever-own-data.title: You own your data, forever
forever-own-data.description: Your notes live on your device, period. You can encrypt them or back them up however you want; it's your decision, not ours.

community.title: AppFlowy is built with a vibrant <0>community</0>

join-us.title: Build by the people for the people
join-us.description:
We collaboratively create apps that suit others’ needs by developing a versatile toolbox of plugins, templates, and more.
Join us to build a toolbox that empowers anyone to create their own system - play and tweak without a limit on what's possible.

docs.title: Do it yourself
docs.description: There isn’t a one size fit all solution and there shouldn’t be. Look for something unique? There’s no need to wait. Make your AppFlowy plugin, and unlock endless possibilities.

get-started-for-free.title: Get started for <0>free</0>
get-started-for-free.description: Choose to own your data and a smarter way to wor
